alert.note: Alert for Huntingdon (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 16 at 3:49PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHEASTERN HUNTINGDON... CENTRAL MIFFLIN AND SOUTH CENTRAL CENTRE COUNTIES THROUGH 415 PM EDT... At 348 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near State College, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Seven Mountains and Belleville around 400 PM EDT. Reedsville around 405 PM EDT. Lewistown, Yeagertown and Highland Park around 410 PM EDT. Alfarata, Reeds Gap State Park and Belltown around 415 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Siglerville, Maitland, Wagner, Barrville and Tussey Mountain Ski Area. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
